_sText: CS_FROZEN By Archanor Features: * 25+ custom textures * Several custom models * 3D Skybox * Music * Soundscapes * Interactivity * Falling snow * Radar map * FPSBanana related material Description: Map has been in progress since 8th of November, but had several more plans such as a basement and alternate routes to getting the hostages out. This was unfortunately cancelled due to the contest was unexpectedly shortened down. However, I think the map turned out great, and I hope you'll have lots of fun playing it. Make sure you try out the radio for some 8-Bit christmas music. Story: Due to the FPSB admins threatening to shut down the website for updates, some of the users went berserk and decided to take them hostage to make sure that never happened. As we all know, once FPSB is offline, all hell breaks loose. Thanks to: Bit Shifter for their awesome "Let It Snow" tune. (Can be played on the stereo system upstairs.) Moroes for his awesome tree models. Mrkit4423 for his X-Mas props. Aurora for the pooltable prefab. Klu for helping me out with soundscapes. If you like this map, make sure to put me on your watchlist.
